description:
Connection Makes a Smarter Business

WeCom is a professional office management tool created by Tencent WeChat team for companies. Connected with WeChat messages, mini programs and WeChat Pay, it has a powerful messaging capability aligned with WeChat and comes with a wide variety of free OA apps to help companies achieve efficient working and management experience inside and outside organization. With comprehensive security, international authorized certification and bank-level encryption, it will ensure the data security of your company.
source: 腾讯科技(深圳)有限公司
